pages.title: Gold Door
pages.text: The Gold Door works similarly to a wooden door until powered by redstone. When powered, the door will lock in place and prevent players from opening.

pages.title: Silver Door
pages.text: The Silver Door is the inverse of the Gold Door: The door will not be able to be opened by players until powered by a redstone signal. When Powered, the door can be freely opened and closed.

pages.title: Lead Door
pages.text: Lead Doors work differently than most doors. They cannot be opened via redstone, and can only be opened manually after multiple attempts. Mobs have a hard time breaking down this door. Cannot be opened by Villagers.

pages.title: Netherite Door
pages.text: Netherite Doors are made by combining Netherite Scrap with a Gold Door in a Smithing Table. Netherite Doors can be assigned a key, and will only open if a player has said key in their inventory. Cannot be opened by Villagers.
